languages.text:
Обеспечивает 70 защиты каждому сектору.
Но добавляет кораблю Друкарское "Теневое поле".

traits.locale_text:
Обеспечивает 70 защиты каждому сектору.
Но добавляет кораблю Друкарское "Теневое поле".

languages.text: Provides 70 points of protection for each sector. Provides the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} with the ability to generate a Drukhari {g|f:f9b2e0f3583a491c91ad19d72e2d2024}Shadow Field{/g}.
languages.original_text: Обеспечивает 70 защиты каждому сектору. Предоставляет флагману возможность генерировать Теневое поле друкари.

traits.locale_text: Provides 70 points of protection for each sector. Provides the flagship with Drukhari Shadow Field.
Provides 70 points of protection for each sector. Provides the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} with the ability to generate a Drukhari Shadow Field.
Provides 70 points of protection for each sector. Provides the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} with the ability to generate a Drukhari Shadow Field.
Provides 70 points of protection for each sector. Provides the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} with the ability to generate a Drukhari Shadow Field.

languages.text: Her sektöre 70 puanlık koruma sağlar. {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Sancak gemisine{/g} Drukhari {g|f:f9b2e0f3583a491c91ad19d72e2d2024}Gölge Alanı{/g} oluşturma kabiliyeti kazandırır.
languages.original_text: Provides 70 points of protection for each sector. Provides the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} with the ability to generate a Drukhari {g|f:f9b2e0f3583a491c91ad19d72e2d2024}Shadow Field{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Her sektöre 70 puanlık koruma sağlar. Sancak gemisine Drukhari Gölge Alanı oluşturma kabiliyeti kazandırır.
Her sektöre 70 puanlık koruma sağlar. Sancak gemisine Drukhari Gölge Alanı oluşturma kabiliyeti kazandırır.

languages.text: Proporciona 70 puntos de protección en cada sector. Confiere a la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} la capacidad de generar un {g|f:f9b2e0f3583a491c91ad19d72e2d2024}Campo de sombra{/g} Drukhari.
languages.original_text: Provides 70 points of protection for each sector. Provides the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} with the ability to generate a Drukhari {g|f:f9b2e0f3583a491c91ad19d72e2d2024}Shadow Field{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Proporciona 70 puntos de protección en cada sector. Confiere a la nave insignia la capacidad de generar un campo de sombra Drukhari.

languages.text: 为每个区域提供70点防护。此外，为{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}提供黑暗灵族舰船的{g|f:f9b2e0f3583a491c91ad19d72e2d2024}暗影领域{/g}能力。
languages.original_text: Provides 70 points of protection for each sector. Provides the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} with the ability to generate a Drukhari {g|f:f9b2e0f3583a491c91ad19d72e2d2024}Shadow Field{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 为每个区域提供70点防护。此外，为旗舰提供黑暗灵族舰船的暗影领域能力。

languages.text: Offre 70 points de protection par secteur. Permet au {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} de générer un {g|f:f9b2e0f3583a491c91ad19d72e2d2024}champ d'ombres{/g} drukhari.
languages.original_text: Provides 70 points of protection for each sector. Provides the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} with the ability to generate a Drukhari {g|f:f9b2e0f3583a491c91ad19d72e2d2024}Shadow Field{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Offre 70 points de protection par secteur. Permet au vaisseau amiral de générer un champ d'ombres drukhari.

languages.text: 各セクターに70ポイントの保護を付与する。デュカーリのシャドウフィールドを発生させる力を{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}に付与する。
languages.original_text: Provides 70 points of protection for each sector. Provides the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} with the ability to generate a Drukhari Shadow Field.

traits.locale_text: 各セクターに70ポイントの保護を付与する。デュカーリのシャドウフィールドを発生させる力を旗艦に付与する。
各セクターに70ポイントの保護を付与する。デュカーリのシャドウフィールドを発生させる力を旗艦に付与する。

languages.text: Gewährt 70 Punkte Schutz für jeden Sektor. Ermöglicht dem {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} die Erzeugung eines Drukhari-{g|f:f9b2e0f3583a491c91ad19d72e2d2024}Schattenfeldes{/g}.
languages.original_text: Provides 70 points of protection for each sector. Provides the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} with the ability to generate a Drukhari {g|f:f9b2e0f3583a491c91ad19d72e2d2024}Shadow Field{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Gewährt 70 Punkte Schutz für jeden Sektor. Ermöglicht dem Flaggschiff die Erzeugung eines Drukhari-Schattenfeldes.

languages.text: Обеспечивает 70 защиты каждому сектору. Предоставляет флагману возможность генерировать Теневое поле друкари.
languages.original_text: Provides 70 points of protection for each sector. Provides the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} with the ability to generate a Drukhari Shadow Field.
